description: The bot farm used AI to create social media profiles impersonating Americans and posting post support for Russia’s war in Ukraine and other pro-Kremlin narratives.
title: U.S. says Russian bot farm used AI to impersonate Americans

description: Middle school students in the town of Malvern impersonated teachers and posted crude and offensive language on fake accounts. The superintendent called the incidents a "gross misuse of social media."
title: A school district in Pa. says students made fake TikTok accounts to target teachers

description: A new report by an Israeli watchdog group ties an Israeli firm to a covert online campaign intended to sway crucial Democratic lawmakers to continue backing Israel’s campaign in Gaza.
title: How Israel tried to use AI to covertly sway Americans about Gaza

description: Even though she wasn't invited to the RNC in Milwaukee, Haley called for unity in the party on Tuesday, urging her convention supporters to vote for former President Donald Trump.
title: Ahead of the Republican Convention, Nikki Haley tells her delegates to vote for Trump

description: Bruce Springsteen, 40 years on from Born in the U.S.A., shows up on Bryan’s new album to offer the wisdom and regret of a lifetime of telling truths and spinning yarns.
title: Zach Bryan makes — and breaks — his own myth on 'The Great American Bar Scene'

description: Boeing has agreed to plead guilty to misleading regulators in connection with the deadly crashes of two 737 Max jets. But that deal with the DOJ has not quieted the anger of crash victims’ families.
title: Families of 737 Max crash victims urge a judge to reject Boeing’s plea deal

description: Ciment met her husband in the 1970s. At the time of their first kiss, he was a married father of two; she was his art student. In her memoir Consent she reconsiders the origin story of their marriage.
title: She was 17. He was 47. #MeToo changed how she thinks of their relationship

description: The herd consists of replicas of real-life elephants personally known to the artisans.
title: Touch one of the 100 life-size Indian elephant sculptures now traveling across the country

description: The Wall Street Journal has conducted multiple rounds of layoffs this year. In a lawsuit, former reporter Stephanie Armour says the paper tried to shed employees with significant health-care costs by citing “trumped up performance issues.”
title: ‘Wall Street Journal’ sued by star reporter for discrimination
